p: The current finding revealed that all tested doses (100mg/kg, 200mg/kg and 400mg/kg) of A. polystachyus extract exhibited significant parasitemia suppression when compared with the negative control group. The maximum suppression (49.25%, p < 0.0001) was revealed at the highest dose of the crude extract (400mg/kg) then by the middle dose of the extract (200mg/kg) (33.67%, p < 0.0001) and 100mg/kg (27.64%, p < 0.01) ( Table 2). All doses of the extract (100mg/kg, 200mg/kg and 400mg/kg) were shown significant (p < 0.001, p < 0.0001, and p < 0.0001, respectively) variance in mean survival time when compared with the negative control group ( Table 2).
